problem.markdown:
>>What is the inventory trade-off in the Make to Stock production?<<
(x) Large finished goods inventories needed to prevent stockouts, but small finished goods inventories needed to keep cost low. ( ) Space required for storage ( ) Excess production capacity is needed to allow early, reliable delivery promises, but minimal production capacity is needed to keep costs low. ( ) Damaged inventory
[Explanation] Retailers often struggle with keeping enough inventories instock while minimizing the cash they have to invest in keeping the inventory. [Explanation]
